interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Swiss Family Robinson (Vault Disney Collection)
Review Date: 2015/12/01
Store: John Mills  (Actor),     Dorothy McGuire  (Actor),     Ken Annakin  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    G    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Walt Disney Studios Home Entertainment, Live Action, All Titles
Product Description: ['One of Disney\'s biggest and most fondly remembered hits, the spectacular screen version of the literary classic SWISS FAMILY ROBINSON is full of breathtaking South Seas scenery, hundreds of exotic animals, and treacherous pirates. This heroic tale chronicles the courageous exploits of the Robinson family after they are shipwrecked on a deserted island. Using teamwork and ingenuity, they skillfully overcome the obstacles of nature and transform their new home into a "civilized" community. But the ultimate challenge lies ahead when a band of cutthroat pirates threaten to destroy the Robinson\'s Makeshift paradise. Capture the thrills, romance, and fun of this unforgettable Disney film!|The film was based on the book by Johann Wyss, written to preserve the tales he and his sons made up while imagining themselves in Robinson Crusoe\'s predicament. Not originally intended for publication, the narrative was later edited and illustrated by Wyss\' descendants.|Filmed on the Caribbean island of Tobago, the motion picture\'s lavish preproduction planning and on-location shooting (22 weeks) resulted in a budget that exceeded $4 million, but the extraordinary box office returns, subsequent popular reissues, and release on home video in 1982 has made it one of Disney\'s top-grossing films.|There was one problem with the filming location of Tobago: it had no animals. Tropical birds, gulls, ostriches, snakes, tigers, zebras, baby elephants, and monkeys were all flown to the island, along with 14 animal trainers.|One afternoon the flamingos Disney "hired" for the film took off from Tobago and headed south to British Guiana. Fortunately, they returned the next day at feeding time.']
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Genre': 'ACTION, Action/Adventure, LIVE', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Anamorphic, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Sessue Hayakawa, Dorothy McGuire, Tommy Kirk, Kevin Corcoran, Janet Munro, Ken Annakin, John Mills, James MacArthurSessue Hayakawa, Dorothy McGuire, Tommy Kirk, Kevin Corcoran, Janet Munro, Ken Annakin, John Mills, James MacArthur   See more', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), Unqualified, Spanish (Dolby Digital 2.0)', 'Runtime': '2 hours and 6 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.35:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'G (General Audience)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.75 x 5.75 x 0.75 inches; 3.04 Ounces', 'Audio Description': 'English, Spanish', 'Item model number': '786936143836', 'Director': 'Ken Annakin', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Anamorphic, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '2 hours and 6 minutes', 'Release date': 'May 7, 2002', 'Actors': 'John Mills, Dorothy McGuire, James MacArthur, Janet Munro, Sessue Hayakawa', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'WALT DISNEY PICTURES', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'}

reference_summary:
Big Hero 6
Ryan Potter  (Actor),     Scott Adsit  (Actor),     Chris Williams  (Director),     Don Hall  (Director)    &                   1                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Kids & Family
["With all the heart and humor audiences expect from Walt Disney Animation Studios, BIG HERO 6 is an action-packed comedy adventure that introduces Baymax, a lovable, personal companion robot, who forms a special bond with robotics prodigy Hiro Hamada. When a devastating turn of events catapults them into the midst of a dangerous plot unfolding in the streets of San Fransokyo, Hiro turns to Baymax and his diverse group of friends -- adrenaline junky Go Go Tomago, neatnik Wasabi, chemistry whiz Honey Lemon and fanboy Fred -- who transform into a band of unlikely heroes. Bring home Disney's BIG HERO 6, featuring comic-book-style action and hilarious, unforgettable characters -- it's fun for the whole family!"]

Monty Python and the Holy Grail (Special Edition)
Graham Chapman  (Actor),     John Cleese  (Actor)    Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Sony Pictures Home Entertainment, All Sony Pictures Titles
["The Monty Python team are at it again in their second movie. This time we follow King Arthur and his knights in their search for the Holy Grail. This isn't your average medieval knights and horses story - for a start, due to a shortage in the kingdom, all the horses have been replaced by servants clopping coconuts together!"]

This heroic tale chronicles the courageous exploits of the Robinson family after they are shipwrecked on a deserted island. Using teamwork and ingenuity, they skillfully overcome the obstacles of nature and transform their new home into a "civilized" community. Tropical birds, gulls, ostriches, snakes, tigers, zebras, baby elephants, and monkeys were all flown to the island, along with 14 animal trainers.|One afternoon the flamingos Disney "hired" for the film took off from Tobago and headed south to British Guiana. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Genre Preference:** Strong inclination towards family-friendly movies, particularly animated films, and an emerging appreciation for classic comedies, including live-action titles with humor. Recently showcased interest in adventure-themed films that still align with a family-oriented focus.

- **Entertainment Type:** Enjoys engaging stories that blend humor and heartwarming themes, indicative of a preference for lighthearted yet meaningful narratives. Shows a growing appreciation for adventure narratives that encompass teamwork and ingenuity, especially enjoyed in films with a nostalgic touch.

- **Audience Focus:** Values content suitable for kids and family viewing, emphasizing wholesome entertainment. While animated films remain a favorite, there is a noted expansion into classic family adventures that maintain a lighthearted tone and appeal to broader audiences.

- **Engagement Style:** Positive and enthusiastic engagement with content, reflected in high ratings and brief, affirmative reviews. Expresses enjoyment in a straightforward manner, often celebrating a film’s charm and adventure aspects.

- **Rating Behavior:** Tends to rate content favorably, consistently giving five-star ratings. This indicates a strong appreciation for quality storytelling and production across various genres, including adventure and comedy.

Overall, the user favors enjoyable, well-crafted films suitable for families and children while embracing classic adventures that resonate with their enthusiasm for uplifting storytelling. Their recent interaction reflects a continued desire to explore narratives that combine family dynamics with thrilling escapades.
